EmailTemplate.name: IPM Notify Finance Leader about TLD is changed on IPM EmailOut Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Attention Target Launch Date is changed for {!IPM_EmailOut_Notification__c.Project_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The Target Launch Date for {!IPM_EmailOut_Notification__c.Project_Name__c} has been updated to {!IPM_EmailOut_Notification__c.Target_Launch_Date__c} from {!IPM_EmailOut_Notification__c.Previous_Target_Launch_Date__c}.
